column2: The small town of Serampore for years has been a major center of trade within the Bengal region. While this may not last, we can take advantage of it in the meantime.
The First Italian War of Independence

The revolutions of our brethen in Milan and Lombardy are shaking the foundations of already fragile Austrian Empire. It looks like it is the perfect time to seize Kingdom of Lombardy-Venice, an Italian land under foreign rule. Even though France may not be able to help us, we can try forming a coalition of Italian states against Austrian Kaiser.

After our dealings with the Turks, we have gained control over the small town of Dedeagatch. With recent efforts to integrate the area into Greece proper and set our claim to the place , it may be a good idea to rename it to Alexandroupoli ("City of Alexander") in honor of King Alexander I, the first Greek king to visit the town..
